remarks: Variation of Axiom of Infinity (using ~ zfinf as a hypothesis).  Axiom of Infinity in [FreydScedrov] p. 283.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-1996.)  (Revised by David Abernethy, 1-Oct-2013.)
statement:
inf1.1 $e |- E. x ( y e. x /\ A. y ( y e. x -> E. z ( y e. z /\ z e. x ) ) ) $.
inf1 $p |- E. x ( x =/= (/) /\ A. y ( y e. x -> E. z ( y e. z /\ z e. x ) ) ) $.
